gradeDescription: A = I excelled at everything I did today!
whatIDidToday: played with as many buddies as possible
noteworthyComments: Today I practiced handling and walking on leash! My trainers helped me get comfortable being gently guided and checked over, and I worked on walking nicely without pulling! I also had lots of fun playing with my friends and enjoyed good cuddles from my trainer!! üê∂ü¶Æüß°
